title: Createsend.com-MStore Integration For RHS
text: Createsend.com is a service provided by Campaign Monitor (https://www.campaignmonitor.com/), which is CRM product. In terms of the Createsend.com integration into MStore, this is just a email server, that we send details to for Createsend.com to email confirmation emails to customers. In doing so, they log the details they received a customer record in the CRM system using the email address. You can change the integration settings in the below website config options:
description:
Createsend.com is a service provided by Campaign Monitor (https://www.campaignmonitor.com/), which is CRM product.


In terms of the Createsend.com integration into MStore, this is just a email server, that we send details to for Createsend.com to email confirmation emails to customers. In doing so, they log the details they received a customer record in the CRM system using the email address. 


You can change the integration settings in the below website config options:

title: Connecting Onto RHS Server (RHS-Welcome)
text: This is the new connection method to connect onto the RHS server and databases, due to there not being unattended access to the RHS server anymore. Go to https://client.wvd.microsoft.com/arm/webclient/index.html. Log into the Microsoft account HarryWillatts@rhs.org.uk. The password for this account can be found in LastPass. You may need to log out of your own Microsoft account on the browser you are using to be able to do this, if you do experience any issues. Once you have logged in, you will then see the below apps. Please select Full RHS Desktop. Once you have logged into this RDP connection, you can RDP onto the RHS-Welcome server, where the SQL databases are held, and you will have SQL access.
description:
This is the new connection method to connect onto the RHS server and databases, due to there not being unattended access to the RHS server anymore.


  1. Go to https://client.wvd.microsoft.com/arm/webclient/index.html.

  2. Log into the Microsoft account HarryWillatts@rhs.org.uk. The password for this account can be found in LastPass. You may need to log out of your own Microsoft account on the browser you are using to be able to do this, if you do experience any issues.

  3. Once you have logged in, you will then see the below apps. Please select Full RHS Desktop.


  4. Once you have logged into this RDP connection, you can RDP onto the RHS-Welcome server, where the SQL databases are held, and you will have SQL access.
